structure.unit: B MEDICAL IMAGING, RADIATION THERAPY, AND RELATED OCCUPATIONS

text.section:
The executive director shall have demonstrated administrative experience relative to budget, management, organizational abilities, and professional communication. The executive director shall:
Be a licensed medical imaging technologist or radiation therapist;
Have a minimum of a bachelorâ€™s degree; and
Meet the qualifications of a board member as required under KRS 311B.030(2).

The executive director and other persons designated by the board shall be bonded by the state in an amount as determined by the board to be approved by the State Treasurer for the faithful performance of related duties.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 7, effective July 12, 2012.
